text: “Dughiar kamɨn ian azeniba bar moghɨra ikuvigham. Datɨrɨghɨn wainɨn azeniba da wainɨn ikarɨzir 1,000pla iti, ezɨ azeniba vaghvagha dar ivezim 1,000 kina. Eghtɨ gɨn temer ataghatariba itiba ko benir kuraba otivigh azenir kaba avegham. Eghtɨ gumaziba danganir kabar asɨziba burisɨ, me uan barir piba sara mangam.
